TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Agency; Figuring out which way is up!

Articles.Content:
Newest vids can be found towards the end

I made probably the simplest SSTO possible, using only the initial parts of the career mode.

http://youtu.be/-L8qqsl3EqM

Unrelated to the vid, a sidenote/ad; feel free to skip:

Once the v0.24 comes out, I'll be doing a sort of a let's play/challenge/quest/thing/idk -series, where I'll attempt to gather all the science in the Kerbal solar system, while doing stuff & following some rules.

More rules/challenges may be added (but not removed) as time goes by.

Edited June 9, 2014 by Comma_dose

Added some boosters to get the SSTO from previous vid go higher and got it to go all the way to Mun (and beyond)

This success(?) was not without sacrifices. Agency now has 3 KIA and 1 Stranded

http://youtu.be/tq4Ni17KvQY

Hope Jeb likes his new home!

http://youtu.be/xQXbJzsfPSs

Had to do some science for research, and decided to make a fly-by of the mun.

Have to say that despite some hicups in the overall performance, it went pretty well according to plan. A shame.

On a further note: KSA's going on a hiatus until v0.24 comes out, and when it does I'll start a brand new thread, so this one will be pretty much dead.

In any case, here's the vid:

http://youtu.be/cFe77EGgKJs

Dropped some pods, Titanfall -esque(?)

Have to make some improvements, though.

http://youtu.be/3snYXrxD-is

The idea of this vid is the exact same as the one above: drop a command pod to KSC and survive.

Well, it turned out that I hit within 1km of the target with a near perfect landing, and I didn't even have to do any course corrections to the trajectory.

I can die happy now.

http://youtu.be/PyV5rLO3C7U

People seemed to be disappointed that I didn't drop a Titan in the last video.

So I dropped a mockup of one in this one.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NmS3C_HAiVk

I now present a challenge to you:

Do what I did in the vid, but with a better looking Titan. Mods or no mods, I leave it up to you

Had a go at a challenge and the result was this timelapse video:

http://youtu.be/gxJvwBgxjUw

It has been a while since I last made a KSP vid, and this time it's a short animation and I'm fairly confident about it.

I lack the intellect to describe it properly, though, so have a look yourself.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SVy2Uz0aoUQ

Took on myself a small challenge of attempting to get to orbit in IVA mode, only to find myself trying to go to Mun twice, and succeeding(?) once.

http://youtu.be/AUf-EvzjlkA

So, I watched Squad's Grab KSP from Steam Summer sale -video, and I thought to myself: "Can I actually try and grab a Kerbal while I'm flying?", moved on to experiment, and this video is the result.

I failed to even succesfully hit him, but there were lots of explosions so I got that going for me, which is nice.

http://youtu.be/mC5Cs07t-tQ

Bob is one lucky Kerbal, though.

v0.24 is out? First look -video is out!

http://youtu.be/eTNhQ3I4bak

This is going to be the last vid ITT. New thread once KSA restarts in full.
